attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We feel that the young Belgian reporter has done much great work for this country and the world, often putting himself and Snowy, his beloved pet dog, in mortal peril.  He has saved lives and, more than that, inspired millions of people across the globe.

This is not intended to be humorous.  We believe that people who do good work, whether they be real or not, ought to be rewarded.  Tintin has certainly done good work and will undoubtedly inspire generations to come.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
